summary: Provides the core asynchronous WebSocket abstraction for the Starlette ASGI framework, managing connection establishment, acceptance, message transmission (text, binary, JSON), and graceful termination.
business_intent: To give developers a high‑level, async‑compatible API for implementing real‑time, bidirectional communication in Prefect’s Starlette‑based services, abstracting the low‑level ASGI WebSocket protocol.
